Reviews.Title: This phone does not ring loud enough
Reviews.Author: Benny Dupre
Reviews.Content: this phone looks good but does not ring as loud as my old razor phone.  it has caused me to miss many important phone calls, as I use it for work and personal purposes.I am definitely NOT SATISFIED with this product.benny dupre

Reviews.Title: Works Okay
Reviews.Author: Deanna Howard
Reviews.Content: It works but sometimes its like it turns itself off and then you miss alot of calls, but for the most it works fine.

Reviews.Title: turns out I got two lemons??
Reviews.Author: T. Lewison
Reviews.Content: 1st one wouldn't activate on ATT network.  Seller was great and send out a replacement.  Replacement woudn't activate either.  Spent an hour on chat with ATT and got it to activate.  Worked for about 2 hour and then lost connection.  Connection would come and go for a couple hours, usually came back after a reboot or when connected to computer via USB.  Then would disconnect when unplugged or after a call was made.  Totally unusable.  Seller again offered to send a replacement but by that time the phone was smashed into many small pieces.  Too bad, I really like the old school RAZR form and function, but I guess I'll be forced into using new technology.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Gayle Ledyard
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband who does not want to text, but simply receive and make calls.  This is his third razr phone and he loves it.  It's lightweight and thin and not cumbersome in your pocket.  Great phone for the money.

Reviews.Title: Did not work properly
Reviews.Author: Bruce Tschappat
Reviews.Content: It did not work properly. At times the screen would not light up when the phone was opened even though the keys were lit. This happened sporadicaly and therefor was useless as a phone.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Skoob
Reviews.Content: This was advertized as new, it was re-furbed and didn't work. Really wanted to find one of these new. Big dissappointment

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: lisa lockett
Reviews.Content: great phone for price work good love it razr v3 at&t; phone are great phone easy to uesd and text can call with

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: J. B. Hurst "esol teacher"
Reviews.Content: this phone only works on a 2g network so it's not for me but it is a good phone and it works.

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR V3 review
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I always wanted a razor and i really like flip phones. Not big on touch screens. And the Razr is just one of the coolest designed flip phones. I had to have it. The phone came on time and was well package. The reason I gave it a 2 was because of these reasons. The side buttons for volume and voice record are very loose. Almost feels like they are going to come off. The cover over the front screen on the outside was coming unglued. The battery cover had dents in it already. And the keys are also coming unglued. Gluing the cover and keys back is not a big issue. But this phone was supposed to be brand new. It was more in used condition. The biggest problem right now is the screen will go black and not come back on. I've only have used this phone for a total of 3 weeks. I have to take out the battery and restart it all over again. And the screen doesn't always come back on. Takes a few tries. It was working good until this. If it didn't have all these issues I would have gave it a 5 star rating. So if you want one of these phones be careful when you buy them. Your taking a risk. You may or may not get a new one.

Reviews.Title: Good Motorola RAZR V3
Reviews.Author: Philip M. Withington "pwithing"
Reviews.Content: This Motorola RAZR  V3 phone is in good shape and functions well as expected.  Nice to have my AT&T; service back again.

Reviews.Title: Raze 3 silver
Reviews.Author: Benwolf
Reviews.Content: Not as well made as the old razrs battery life not very good.. I paid 79.00 for it, too high...should be around 50.00.  I would not recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Poor reception
Reviews.Author: Janice Imhoff
Reviews.Content: Very light weight and poor reception, drops calls constantly......I guess it is like they say, times are changing and we need to learn to change with it

ProductInfo.Features:
Cool Design
Calling Features
Messaging, Internet and Tools
Imaging and Entertainment
Vital Statistics: The RAZR V3's battery cover is designed to have a very tight fit with the phone case. You may need to use your fingernail or a very thin instrument to depress the small battery cover release button. When replacing the cover, make sure the cover securely snaps into place before operating the phone.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3 AT&T Phone with Camera, Bluetooth and Video Player - Silver
